scripts.dev: bash -c 'find _site -mindepth 1 ! -path "_site/assets" ! -path "_site/assets/generated" ! -path "_site/assets/generated/*" -delete && rm -rf .jekyll-cache/Jekyll && rm -f assets/css/output.css' && tailwindcss -i ./assets/css/input.css -o ./assets/css/output.css && concurrently "npm run jekyll" "npm run tailwind"
scripts.fresh: rm -rf _site assets/css/output.css .jekyll-cache && tailwindcss -i ./assets/css/input.css -o ./assets/css/output.css && concurrently "npm run jekyll" "npm run tailwind"
